title: NASA ESCAPADE Mars Mission
location: Launch from Earth; Mars orbit in 2026
explanation: ESCAPADE will study Mars’ magnetic field and plasma environment using twin spacecraft. Launch via Blue Origin’s New Glenn.

title: ISRO Gaganyaan Uncrewed Test Flight
explanation: ISRO will test life support and safety systems for India’s first human spaceflight. This is the first uncrewed G1 mission.

title: Total Lunar Eclipse
explanation: During a total lunar eclipse, the Moon passes through Earth's shadow. Totality lasts ~58 minutes.

title: Partial Lunar Eclipse
location: Americas, Europe, Africa, parts of Asia
explanation: During a partial lunar eclipse, the Moon passes through Earth's shadow. ~96% of the Moon will be obscured.
